channel.title: 2 Questions about Shops!
channel.description:
1) How do i change the price for items in a shop because they are not in shops.cfg...
could they be in client.java or something?
2) how do i make an item sell-able and edit the price that it sells for?
or [b]cant[/b] i edit the price that it sells for?
thanks
P.S i am not a dummy i have just forgot all this because i havent been doing Moparscape Servers for ages....

erm has some guy just came on my thread and put their question on here?

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions about Shops!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

The three numbers that come after the item name and examine.

item = 384          Raw_shark	           Swap_this_note_at_any_bank_for_a_Raw_shark.       	x	       x	        x	       0	        0	      0

Change the three Xs to the price you want your items to be.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions about Shops!

item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Ruzuronni”]were do i put this in here?

case 3: //Hitpoint
//sendFrame164(6216);
//sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you just advanced a hitpoints level!”, 6217);
//sendFrame126(“Your hitpoints level is now “+playerLevel[3]+” .”, 6218);
sendMessage(“Congratulations, you just advanced a hitpoints level.”);
//NpcDialogueSend = true;
break;[/quote]

case 3: //Hitpoint
	    //sendFrame164(6216);
            //sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a hitpoints level!", 6217);
            //sendFrame126("Your hitpoints level is now "+playerLevel[3]+" .", 6218);
            sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a hitpoints level.");
            //NpcDialogueSend = true;
              addItem(ITEM#, 1);
               sendMessage("Congratz On Maxing Out Your "+playerLevel[#]+", Have A Skill Cape!");
            break;

Paste that over case 3
